name: Psychic Fangs
description: You materialize a set of large fangs that bite at a creature with psychic energy. Make a ranged attack, dealing 2d6 + MOVE psychic damage on a hit.Â  On a hit, this move bypasses and ends Aurora Veil, and is not affected by Light Screen and Reflect.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
